reviewText: I've got a copy of this a couple years ago and I enjoyed all the exciting Turkey Hunts! My favorite part of the whole video is when Bill Jordan took the Grand Slam of Turkeys with a bow and arrow, which I understand includes the Osceola in Florida, the Eastern in his home state of Georgia, the Rio Grande at the Encinitos Ranch in Texas, and a beautiful Merriam's in Idaho. Hopefully, I might get a Grand Slam with a bow like Bill did in one spring and on Video.
